title: If all governments were made up only of women, would there still be wars? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, because mostly more genetically masculine females would be running things all humans have faulty right anxious/negative brains that drive all human made suffering, genetically feminine females can have right right brain anxiety driven evil too just wait until little K.Y gets control in North Korea one will see how she shafts people lol. EGMi maximises use of the left logical/positive brain our goodness/oneness/inner happiness, we do see gender or race as much as brain hemisphere use. Kamala shows high use of the left brain she seems a little genetically masculine, with maximised left brain use this is irrelevant.

Most probably. The greatest women in history were everything but pacifist: like Theodora, empress consort in Byzantium; Elizabeth of England & Marie Stuart of Scotland who went to war over the rule of Great Britain, the latter of whom ended up losing her head; Catherine the Great & Theresa of Austria, who agreed (although the later unwillingly) to the First Partition of Poland; Queen Victoria lived in an era in which India & Africa were colonized. It’s known she herself was negligent during the Irish Famine, adopted the title of Empress in India & lived during the conquest of the Asante & most of British Africa. In the Orient, let’s remember as well that Empress Cixi willingly sided with the Boxer Rebels when it came to the massacres of priests, nuns & converts, which provoked the intervention of many Western Nations that otherwise would not have interests in common.
